Question
========
For `x <- c(5, NA, 9)`, what is `sum(x)` by default?

Answerlist
----------
* 14
* NA
* 9
* 5

Solution
========
By default, arithmetic with missing values returns `NA` because the sum is unknown unless you explicitly remove missing values using `na.rm = TRUE`.
